title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 506 - State Purchase, Rental And Requisition In Event Of Attack
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 506 - State Purchase, Rental And Requisition In Event Of Attack

State Regulations
§ 506.1 - Authorization for and purpose for procurement
§ 506.2 - Type of emergency materials
§ 506.3 - Other purposes for procurement
§ 506.4 - Price of materials
§ 506.5 - Payment for purchases
§ 506.6 - Requisition of materials
§ 506.7 - Supplies furnished until facilities restored and financial status established
§ 506.8 - Emergency lodging
§ 506.9 - Lodging prices
§ 506.10 - Requisition of lodging
§ 506.11 - Lodging furnished until financial status established
§ 506.12 - Form employed for emergency procurement
§ 506.13 - Procedures for emergency procurement
§ 506.14 - Audit of procurement forms
§ 506.15 - Procedure for requisition

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 506

Statutory authority: New York State Defense Emergency Act
[L. 1951, ch. 784], §§ 21[3]-[4], 25[1]-[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
